title: ‘I’m Exhausted’: Tour de France Dominator Tadej Pogačar out of Olympics, No Vuelta for Jonas Vingegaard
content:
Brutally tough Tour de France takes its toll as question marks also linger over summer schedules of Cavendish, Roglič.

Read the full article at ‘I’m Exhausted’: Tour de France Dominator Tadej Pogačar out of Olympics, No Vuelta for Jonas Vingegaard on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
